Translations.Text: phir un ke baadh aise na qalaf paida hoye, ke unhone namaaz zaaye kardi aur nafsaani qaahisho ke piche pad gaye, so un ka nuqsaan un ke aage aayega
bajuz un ke jo tauba karle aur imaan laaye aur nek amal kare, aise log jannath mein jayenge aur un ki zara si bhi haq talfi na ki jayegi
hameshgi waali jannato mein jin ka ghaayebaana waada, Allah meherbaan ne apne bandho se kiya hai, beshak us ka waada pura hone waala hee hai
wo log wahaan koyi laghu baath na sunenge, sirf salaam hee salaam sunenge, un ke liye wahaa subaah shaam un ka rizq hoga
ye hai wo jannath jis ka waaris hum apne bandho mein se unhe banaate hain, jo muttaqi ho
hum baghair tere rab ke hukm ke utar nahi sakte, hamaare aage piche aur un ke darmiyaan ki kul cheeze, osi ki milkiyath mein hain, tera parvardigaar bhulne waala nahi
aasmaano ka, zameen ka aur jo kuch un ke darmiyaan hain, sab ka rab wahi hai, to, tu osi ki bandagi kar aur us ki ibaadath par jam ja, kya tere ilm mein us ka hum naam hum pallah koyi aur bhi hain
insaan kehta hai ke jab main mar jaonga to kya phir zinda kar ke nikaala jaonga
kya ye insaan itna bhi yaad nahi rakhta ke hum ne ose is se pehle paida kiya, halaan ke wo kuch bhi na tha
tere parvardigaar ki qasam! hum unhe aur shaitano ko jama kar ke zaroor zaroor jahannum ke ird gird ghutno ke bal gire hoye haazir karenge
hum phir har har giruh se unhe alag nikaal khada karenge, jo Allah rahmaan se bahuth akde akde phirte thein
phir hum unhe bhi qoob jaante hain, jo jahannam ke daaqile ke zyaada sazawaar hain
tum mein se har ek wahaan zaroor waarid hone waala hain, ye tere parvardigaar ke zimme qatayi faisal shuda amr hain
phir hum parhezgaaro ko to bacha lenge aur na farmaano ko osi mein ghutno ke bal gira hoa chohd denge
jab un ke saamne hamaari roushan aayate tilaawath ki jaati hai, to kaafir musalmaano se kehte hain, bataao hum tum duno jamaato mein se kis ka martaba zyada hain? aur kis ki majlis shaandaar hain
hum to un se pehle bahuth si jamaato ko ghaarat kar chuke hain, jo saazo samaan aur naamo namoodh mein un se bad chahd kar thi

keh dijiye! jo gumraahi mein ho, to Allah rahmaan us ko qoob lambi mahullath deta hain, yahaan tak ke wo un cheezo ko dekh le jin ka waada kiye jaate hain, yaani azaab ya qayaamath ko, us waqt un ko sahih taur par maloom ho jayega ke kaun bure martabe waala aur kis ka jhatta kamzoor hai
aur hidaayath yaafta logo ko Allah ta’ala hidaayath me badaata hai, aur baaqi rehne waali nekiyaan tere rab ke nazdeek sawaab ke lehaaz se aur anjaam ke lehaaz se bahuth hee behtar hai
kya tu ne ose bhi dekha jis ne hamaari aayato se kufr kiya aur kaha ke mujhe to maal aur aulaad zaroor hee di jayegi
kya wo ghayb par muttale hain, ya Allah ka koyi waada le chuka
har giz nahi, ye jo bhi keh raha hai, hum ose zaroor likh lenge, aur us ke liye azaab badaaye chale jayenge
ye jin chizo ko keh raha hai, ose hum us ke baadh le lenge, aur ye to bilkul akela hee hamaare saamne haazir hoga
unhone Allah ke siva dosre maaboodh bana rakhe ha, ke wo un ke liye baayise izzath ho
lekin aisa hargiz hona nahi, wo to un ki puja se munkir ho jayenge aur ulthe un ke dushman ban jayenge
kya tu ne nahi dekha ke hum kaafiro ke paas shaitaano ko bhejte hain, jo unhe qoob uksaate hai
tu un ke baare mein jaldi na kar, hum to khud hee un ke liye muddath shumaari kar rahe hain
jis din hum parhezgaaro ko Allah rehman ki taraf ba taur mehmaan jama karenge
aur gunehgaaro ko saqth pyaas ki haalath mein jahannam ki taraf haank le jaayenge
kisi ko shifa’ath ka eqtiyaar na hoga,sivaaye un ke jinhone Allah ta’ala ki taraf se koyi qaul qaraar le liya
un ka qaul to ye hai ke Allah rahmaan ne bhi aulaad eqtiyaar ki hai
yaqinan tum bahuth buri aur bhaari cheez laaye ho
qareeb hai ke is qaul ki wajeh se asmaan phat jaaye aur zameen shaq ho jaaye aur pahaad reze reze ho jaaye
ke wo rahmaan ki aulaad saabith karne baithe
shaan rahmaan ke laayeq nahi ke wo aulaad rakhe
asmaan aur zameen mein jo kuch hai sab ke sab Allah ke ghulaam ban kar hee aane waale hai
un sab ko us ne gher rakha hai, aur sab ko puri tarah gin bhi rakha hai
ye saare ke saare qayaamath ke din akele us ke paas haazir hone waale hai
beshak jo imaan laaye hai aur jinhone shaayista amaal kiye hai, un ke liye Allah rahmaan muhabbath paida kar dega
hum ne is Qur’an ko teri zabaan mein bahuth hee asaan kar diya hai, ke tu is ke zariye se parhezgaaro ko khush qabri de aur jhagdaalo logo ko dara de
hum ne un se pehle bahuth si jamaate tabaah kar di hain, kya un mein se ek ki bhi aahat tu paata hai, ya un ki awaaz ki bhanak bhi tere kaan mein padti hai
